alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 02 at 10:05PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Cache Valley/Utah Portion, Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley, Wasatch Back, Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive rainfall may result in flooding of small streams, creeks and flood prone areas as well as localized urban flooding. Debris flows and mudslides from recent burn scars are also possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread rain and thunderstorms are forecast across northern Utah through Thursday morning. Areas of heavy rainfall with rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are forecast. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. Be especially cautious when driving at night when it is harder to recognize flood dangers.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
